featured.text: If we can ______ to, we will take a vacation abroad in the summer.
Having saved enough money, Joy two trips for this summer vacation, one to France and the other to Australia.
The travel company wanted to 26 people to take January vacations, so they reached out to a psychologist.
you want to give your family a nice, wholesome vacation, try visiting this charming town.

definition.zh_def: 假期，通常指從工作或學校中休息的時間，通常用於旅遊或放鬆。
definition.en_def: A period of time spent away from home or work, often for relaxation or travel.
definition.example: We are planning a vacation to the beach next month.
